data_table.description: The subject consent data table contains subject IDs, consent information, subject aliases, and affection status for focal segmental glomerulosclerosis (FSGS) or chronic kidney disease (CKD).

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC

variable.name: SOURCE_SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Subject ID used in the Source Repository

variable.name: AFFECTION_STATUS
variable.description: Case control status of the subject for focal segmental glomerulosclerosis (FSGS) or chronic kidney disease (CKD)
